pullRequest.title: Added ARM64 support to Sentinel and added ARM64 job to Travis-CI
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added ARM64 architecture in .travis.yml
Updated 'embedded-consul' version to 2.2.0, 'consul-api' version to 1.4.5 and added groovy-all, slf4j-simple and slf4j-api dependencies for ARM64 support.
Updated grpc.version for 'io.grpc:protoc-gen-grpc-java' to 1.30.2, for ARM64 support.

Signed-off-by: odidev odidev@puresoftware.com

nodes.bodyText: Why do we need these dependencies?

commit.message:
Added ARM64 support to Sentinel and added ARM64 job to Travis-CI

1. Added ARM64 architecture in .travis.yml
2. Updated 'embedded-consul' version to 2.2.0, 'consul-api' version to 1.4.5 and added groovy-xml dependency with version 3.0.6 and test scope for ARM64 support.
3. Updated grpc.version for 'io.grpc:protoc-gen-grpc-java' to 1.30.2, for ARM64 support.

Signed-off-by: odidev <odidev@puresoftware.com>
